member.name: F:YoutubeExtractor.AudioType.Unknown
member.summary: The audio type is unknown. This can occur if YoutubeExtractor is not up-to-date.

member.name: T:YoutubeExtractor.DownloadUrlResolver
member.summary: Provides a method to get the download link of a YouTube video.

member.name: M:YoutubeExtractor.DownloadUrlResolver.DecryptDownloadUrl(YoutubeExtractor.VideoInfo)
member.summary: Decrypts the signature in the property and sets it to the decrypted URL. Use this method, if you have decryptSignature in the method set to false.
member.param: The video info which's downlaod URL should be decrypted.
member.exception: There was an error while deciphering the signature.

member.name: M:YoutubeExtractor.DownloadUrlResolver.GetDownloadUrls(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a list of s for the specified URL.
member.param: The URL of the YouTube video.
A value indicating whether the video signatures should be decrypted or not. Decrypting consists of a HTTP request for each , so you may want to set this to false and call on your selected later.
member.returns: A list of s that can be used to download the video.
member.exception: The parameter is not a valid YouTube URL.
An error occurred while downloading the YouTube page html.
The Youtube page could not be parsed.

member.name: M:YoutubeExtractor.DownloadUrlResolver.TryNormalizeYoutubeUrl(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Normalizes the given YouTube URL to the format http://youtube.com/watch?v={youtube-id} and returns whether the normalization was successful or not.
member.returns: true, if the normalization was successful; false, if the URL is invalid.

member.name: P:YoutubeExtractor.VideoInfo.AdaptiveType
member.summary: Gets an enum indicating whether the format is adaptive or not.
member.value: AdaptiveType.Audio or AdaptiveType.Video if the format is adaptive; otherwise, AdaptiveType.None.

member.name: P:YoutubeExtractor.VideoInfo.AudioBitrate
member.summary: The approximate audio bitrate in kbit/s.
member.value: The approximate audio bitrate in kbit/s, or 0 if the bitrate is unknown.

member.name: P:YoutubeExtractor.VideoInfo.AudioExtension
member.summary: Gets the audio extension.
member.value: The audio extension, or null if the audio extension is unknown.

member.name: P:YoutubeExtractor.VideoInfo.AudioType
member.summary: Gets the audio type (encoding).

member.name: P:YoutubeExtractor.VideoInfo.CanExtractAudio
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the audio of this video can be extracted by YoutubeExtractor.
member.value: true if the audio of this video can be extracted by YoutubeExtractor; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:YoutubeExtractor.VideoInfo.DownloadUrl
member.summary: Gets the download URL.

member.name: P:YoutubeExtractor.VideoInfo.FormatCode
member.summary: Gets the format code, that is used by YouTube internally to differentiate between quality profiles.

member.name: P:YoutubeExtractor.VideoInfo.RequiresDecryption
member.summary:
Gets a value indicating whether this video info requires a signature decryption before the download URL can be used.
This can be achieved with the

member.name: P:YoutubeExtractor.VideoInfo.Resolution
member.summary: Gets the resolution of the video.
member.value: The resolution of the video, or 0 if the resolution is unkown.

member.name: P:YoutubeExtractor.VideoInfo.Title
member.summary: Gets the video title.

member.name: P:YoutubeExtractor.VideoInfo.VideoExtension
member.summary: Gets the video extension.

member.name: P:YoutubeExtractor.VideoInfo.VideoType

member.name: P:YoutubeExtractor.VideoInfo.HtmlPlayerVersion
member.summary: We use this in the method to decrypt the signature

member.name: T:YoutubeExtractor.VideoNotAvailableException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the video is not available for viewing. This can happen when the uploader restricts the video to specific countries.

member.name: T:YoutubeExtractor.VideoType
member.summary: The video type. Also known as video container.

member.name: F:YoutubeExtractor.VideoType.Mobile
member.summary: Video for mobile devices (3GP).

member.name: T:YoutubeExtractor.YoutubeParseException
member.summary:
The exception that is thrown when the YouTube page could not be parsed. This happens, when YouTube changes the structure of their page.
Please report when this exception happens at www.github.com/flagbug/YoutubeExtractor/issues
